This place oozes charm and history just as thick as their chocolate! It's been around since the 1800's.  Small intimate cafe just steps from La Rambla.  Xoxolata €3,10 with whipped cream (suis) €3,70. Perfectly thick and not too sweet so it paired well with the sugared churros. 2 orders of xurros €1,65 which came out to about 6-7 lopped xurros. Come when they first open at 9am, xurros are fresh! They allow take away and credit cards too.
